name: frank-bot
description: Expose Google Calendar and Contacts via the Model Context Protocol.
description_for_human: Lets ChatGPT check your Google Calendar and search Contacts.
description_for_model: Provides tools to list the user's Google Calendar events for any day or time range and to search Google Contacts by name, email, or phone. Requires a pre-configured token.json with the appropriate Google scopes.

tools.name: list_calendar_events
tools.description: Retrieve Google Calendar events for a specific day in your timezone or for any RFC3339 time range.

day.description: Optional ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD). When present, events for that day (in the configured DEFAULT_TIMEZONE) are returned.

time_min.description: Optional RFC3339 timestamp that overrides 'day'. Lower bound (inclusive) for event start times.

max_results.description: Maximum number of events to return.

time_zone.description: IANA timezone name used when deriving day ranges. Defaults to DEFAULT_TIMEZONE.

calendar_id.description: Optional calendar ID to query. Defaults to the primary calendar.

calendar_name.description: Optional display name of the calendar to query.

tools.name: search_contacts
tools.description: Search Google Contacts / People API with free-form text (names, emails, or phone numbers).

query.description: Free-form text to match against contact names, emails, or phone numbers.

max_results.description: Maximum number of contacts to return.

tools.name: create_calendar_event
tools.description: Create a Google Calendar event with optional attendees.

attendees.description: Optional list of attendee email addresses.

time_zone.description: Optional IANA timezone name (defaults to DEFAULT_TIMEZONE).

calendar_id.description: Optional calendar ID to create the event in.

calendar_name.description: Optional calendar name to target instead of the default.

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List calendars accessible to the authenticated user.

include_access_role.description: Include the accessRole for each calendar.

primary_only.description: Return only the primary calendar if true.

name.description: Optional name to include in greeting.
